questions.quote: That was the Vice President of the post office. I didn't get the transfer.. They knew it wasn't me doing my route!
You couldn't figure out the "World's Theory" for yourself? It's just common sense. Anybody knows, ya gotta keep your worlds apart.
I told him to meet us here in ten minutes. How long has it been?
Whoa, this is a beauty. Great cut. It's probably very flattering.
Yes, it's been awful. I wanted to tell somebody.  Help me Kramer! Help me!
Oh, no no no, you gotta call him the next day, it's common courtesy.
W-well, what does it matter? It's my car, I can do whatever I want with it.
Not ready? It has to be ready! What kind of a business are you running here?
You see, this is what I do with women. I start out too strong, now I have to become real, that's when it all falls apart. What good is real? They don't want real, they want funny.
Let me ask you something. When you go into a store, does it bother you that they make the security guard just stand there all day?
